Products.METATAG_Description: Whether gardening or biking, we have a great selection of UPF 50+ sun gloves and sun sleeves to keep you covered down to your fingertips.
Products.METATAG_Title: Sun Protective Eclipse Long Sun Sleeves - UPF 50+
Products.Photo_AltText: Beach Sun Sleeves for Ultraviolet Protection
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing: Not sure how the weather is going to turn out? Want extra UV protection for part of the day, but not all of the day? Well now the solution is simple! Whether gardening or biking, we have a great selection of UPF 50+ sun gloves and sun sleeves to keep you covered down to your fingertips. Try a pair of these Eclipse Sun Sleeves for extra UV protection really fast.
Products.ProductFeatures:
• Pricing includes one PAIR of Sun Sleeves
  • UPF 50+ - maximum UV protection
  • accelerated moisture evaporation/cooling
  • odor control.
  • Dry-feel fabric cools the skin as it wicks away moisture
  • Overall sleeve lengths: SM - 20 IN. | MED - 21.5 IN. | LG - 23.5 IN.
  • Sleeve diameter at top of arm: SM - 3.75 IN. | MED - 4.75 IN. | LG - 5 IN.
Products.TechSpecs:
Small: 90-130 lbs | Medium: 130-170 lbs| Large: 170-210 lbs
Actual Overall Sleeve Lengths : SM â€“ 20 IN. | MED â€“ 21.5 IN. | LG â€“ 23.5 IN.

Products.METATAG_Description: The Sport Hat hits the mark for the active outdoors person. This full brim design offers excellent sun protection on the court, green, eddy, and trail.
Products.METATAG_Title: SPF & UPF 50 Hats | Sun Protection Hats | UV Skinz
Products.Photo_AltText: Stylish Sun Safety Sports Hat with Wide Brim - SPF/UPF 50+
Products.CUSTOM_METATAGS_OVERRIDE: <title>SPF & UPF 50 Hats | Sun Protection Hats | UV Skinz</title> <meta name="description" content="The UPF 50 Sport Hat hits the mark for the active outdoors person. This full brim design offers excellent sun protection. Order today at UVSkinz.com!" />
Products.ExtInfo:
• Hand wash cold with mild soap. Line dry. Do not iron
  • Packs flat or rolls into a cone for travel.
  • Do not fold or crease brim
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing: The Sport Hat hits the mark for the active outdoors person. This full brim design offers excellent sun protection while maintaining clear peripheral vision on the court, green, eddy, and trail. Wide brim styling and its ultra lightweight design make the Sport Hat a favorite for athletes and gardeners alike. 4" crescent shape brim with floatable foam core and poly brim. 5" back veil with option to tuck into hat crown. UPF 50+ certified. Strategic mesh ventilation.
Products.ProductFeatures:
• 4â€ crescent shape brim with floatable foam core and poly brim
  • 5" back veil with option to tuck into hat crown
  • UPF 50+ certified (mesh vents not rated)
  • Strategic mesh ventilation
  • Water repellent/stain resistant
  • Ponytail friendly opening at back of crown
  • Interior wicking brow sweatband
  • Chinstrap with cord lock
  • External sizing band for custom fit
  • Lightweight 2.2 ounces

Products.ProductName: Cotz Pure Botanicals Sunscreen - Lightly Tinted - SPF 45
Products.Google_Product_Category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Skin Care > Sunscreen
Products.METATAG_Description: CoTZ Pure 100% natural SPF 30 sunscreen feels silky soft, with a sheer matte finish and has no preservatives. Find a great selection of CoTZ sunscreen products at UV Skinz today.
Products.METATAG_Title: CoTZ SPF 30 Sunscreen | CoTZ The Healthier Sunscreen
Products.Photo_AltText: Cotz Pure 100% Natural SPF 30
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing:
CoTZ SPF 30 sunscreen feels silky & soft, with a sheer matte finish. Lightly tinted to instantly enhance skin radiance.

All ingredients approved by one or more leading organizations: National Products Association, EcoCert, NSF International, Green Star Rated.

CoTZ The Healthier Sunscreen is 100% Free of: Chemical Sunscreens, Oils, Fragrances.

Contains Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide, the #1 and #2 rates sunscreen ingredients for UVA-UVB protection.
Products.TechSpecs:
Active Ingredients:

Titanium Dioxide 4.1% (Sunscreen)
Zinc Oxide 8.4% (Sunscreen)

Inactive Ingredients:
Brassica Campestris/Aleurites Fordii Oil Copolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Capric/Caprylic Triglyceride, Cellulose Gum, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Melissa Officinalis (Balm Mint) Extract, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Esters, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Xanthan Gum, Water

Products.ProductName: TruKid Eczema Care Daily SPF 30+ Sunscreen (3.4oz)
Products.METATAG_Description: Natural, unscented, and gentle, TruKid eczema sunscreen moisturizes and protects your child's skin. Order this natural sunscreen for eczema online at UV Skinz!
Products.METATAG_Title: TruKid Eczema Sunscreen | Natural Sunscreen for Eczema | UV Skinz
Products.Photo_AltText: Sun Protective Eczema Care Sun Block for Kids - SPF 30+
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing: Don't let eczema prone skin get in the way! A truly natural mineral sunscreen, TruKid Eczema Daily SPF 30+ is designed for kids with eczema prone or sensitive skin. It gently moisturizes with aloe vera, sunflower oil, jojoba oil and hyaluronic acid. Perfect for kids of all ages and those who are still kids at heart. Our TruKid Eczema sunscreen is highly rated on EWG. It is PETA certified to be cruelty-free. The packaging is 100% recyclable PET plastic and BPA-free, so itâ€™s good for your kids and the planet! Apply TruKid Eczema Daily SPF 30+ sunscreen and enjoy the outdoors without worrying about your eczema. For best results, reapply every 40 minutes. Now get out & play!
Products.ProductFeatures:
• Non-nano
  • This natural sunscreen for eczema is the highest rated for any kidâ€™s line by Environmental Working Group (EWG)
  • UVA/UVB Broad Spectrum Protection
  • Mineral based- sustainable sourced zinc
  • Reef-friendly
  • Vitamin A free
  • Unscented
  • Convenient 3.4 oz. travel size
Products.TechSpecs:
Purified water

Aloe barbadensis leaf juice

Capric/caprylic triglycerides (coconut)

Sorbitan stearate (vegetable)

Polyglyceryl-4 isostearate

Hexyl laurate

Cetyl dimethicone (sand)

Dimethicone

Castor oil

Magnesium sulfate (epsom salt)

Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil

Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil

Cucumis sativus (cucumber) fruit extract

Camellia sinesis (green tea) oil

Tocopherol (Vitamin E)

Punica granatum extract (pomegranate juice)

Hyaluronic acid

*Polymaminopropyl biguanide

*= extremely mild antimicrobial, no

Products.ProductName: Baby Girls Knot Romper
Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing: Comfortable, cute and easy to crawl, run and play in, this Knot Romper maximizes fun wherever you take your little one, from the park, to the zoo, to grandma's house and beyond. The overall silhouette is a classic, timeless piece and can be accessorized with anything from bows to a cardigan to suit any occasion! Made from our stretch woven sun fabric, romper features knot ties that secure adjustable straps in place. Certified UPF 50+.

  • Knot ties for adjustable straps
